name: Windfall (itch) (Radagasd)
description:
Description

This is a small prototype game in which you can freely fly through one map with a time-tracked ring parkour. 

The primary goal of this prototype was to just get a game out there, as you might notice the game can be quite taxing on your computer. If you've followed me on twitter (@KelvinvanHoorn) or my website, you could see that most of this prototype was made a few months back but I've only now gotten around to making a proper menu with settings and releasing it in a playable state.

If I were to continu work on this prototype I would focus first on improving the performance, updating the shaders, adding music, and adding more settings like reversed inputs.

Controls

A gamepad is recommended but not necessary.

The game should work with mouse/keyboard and generic gamepads (PS and Xbox controllers should be fine, but haven't been tested).

ActionMouse & keyboardGamepadPlane pitchW/S, Up/Down arrowLeft stick (y-direction)
Plane rollA/D, Left/Right arrowLeft stick (x-direction)Plane yawQ/ELeft/Right triggerPlane throttleShift/ControlLeft/Right bumperCamera rotationMouse positionRight stickReset cameraLeft mouse buttonRight stick pressReset plane/mapSpace barSelectOpen menuEscapeStartMac & Linux

I don't have a Mac or Linux system, so I have no clue if these versions work or not, nor do I plan on supporting them anytime soon. They are purely up here for you to test, let me know if they work!
